game.name: One More Line
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ONE MORE LINE is a highly addictive, one button, space disco, skill timing game! Steam edition features 2-4 player local multi-player and no advertising. All for a very low price! Can you put a price on fun though?
game.shortDescriptionEn: ONE MORE LINE is a highly addictive, one button, space disco, skill timing game! Steam edition features 2-4 player local multi-player and no advertising. All for a very low price! Can you put a price on fun though?

reviewHighlights.text: One More Line, developed and published by SMG Studio, is a minimalist yet intensely addictive arcade experience that strips gaming down to its purest...
